dc_title_s: Hyakumanbun no ichi kōkūzu, Maps Index
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile is an index to 1:1,000,000 scale maps of Southeast Asia and Australia, titled 'Hyakumanbun no ichi kōkūzu.’ To create this index, footprints were generated using the fishnet tool, and metadata were supplied for the digitized paper maps by Stanford University Libraries. After the footprints were created, the shapefile was trimmed and labeled according to the sources.This layer provides an index map that can be used to locate individual scanned map sheets.
